segment.source: End-to-End Deployment Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Deployment Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: End-to-End Deployment Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Deployment Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: End-to-End Deployment Scenario for MED-V 2.0
segment.target: End-to-End Deployment Scenario for MED-V 2.0

segment.source: This sample scenario for Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 helps you deploy the MED-V components in your enterprise by using multiple scenarios end-to-end.
segment.target: This sample scenario for Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 helps you deploy the MED-V components in your enterprise by using multiple scenarios end-to-end.

segment.source: You can think of this sample scenario as a case study that helps put the individual scenarios and procedures in context.
segment.target: You can think of this sample scenario as a case study that helps put the individual scenarios and procedures in context.

segment.source: This section provides basic information and directions for deploying MED-V components as an end-to-end solution in your enterprise.
segment.target: This section provides basic information and directions for deploying MED-V components as an end-to-end solution in your enterprise.

segment.source: MED-V Deployment Step-by-step Scenario
segment.target: MED-V Deployment Step-by-step Scenario

segment.source: The topics in this step-by-step scenario include the following:
segment.target: The topics in this step-by-step scenario include the following:

segment.source: MED-V 2.0 Supported Configurations discusses the requirements that you must have to install and run Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 in your environment.
segment.target: MED-V 2.0 Supported Configurations discusses the requirements that you must have to install and run Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 in your environment.

segment.source: This topic specifies the operating system requirements, configuration requirements, and MED-V workspace requirements.
segment.target: This topic specifies the operating system requirements, configuration requirements, and MED-V workspace requirements.

segment.source: This topic also includes localization information about the languages that MED-V 2.0 supports.
segment.target: This topic also includes localization information about the languages that MED-V 2.0 supports.

segment.source: MED-V 2.0 Deployment Overview discusses general information and instructions to help you install and deploy MED-V throughout your enterprise.
segment.target: MED-V 2.0 Deployment Overview discusses general information and instructions to help you install and deploy MED-V throughout your enterprise.

segment.source: The MED-V components are client-based and are delivered and managed by using your existing enterprise infrastructure and processes.
segment.target: The MED-V components are client-based and are delivered and managed by using your existing enterprise infrastructure and processes.

segment.source: This topic provides an overview of the MED-V solution that includes information about the MED-V installation files and the MED-V components that you deploy.
segment.target: This topic provides an overview of the MED-V solution that includes information about the MED-V installation files and the MED-V components that you deploy.

segment.source: This topic also provides a high-level overview of the MED-V installation and deployment process.
segment.target: This topic also provides a high-level overview of the MED-V installation and deployment process.

segment.source: Prepare the Deployment Environment for MED-V discusses how to prepare your environment for a MED-V 2.0 deployment.
segment.target: Prepare the Deployment Environment for MED-V discusses how to prepare your environment for a MED-V 2.0 deployment.

segment.source: This section describes the prerequisites that are required for the MED-V environment, such as Microsoft Windows 7 and an Active Directory infrastructure in which you use Group Policy to provide centralized management and configuration of operating systems, applications, and users' settings.
segment.target: This section describes the prerequisites that are required for the MED-V environment, such as Microsoft Windows 7 and an Active Directory infrastructure in which you use Group Policy to provide centralized management and configuration of operating systems, applications, and users' settings.

segment.source: This section also describes the prerequisites that you must have for installing and deploying MED-V 2.0 throughout your enterprise, such as Windows Virtual PC and the required Windows Virtual PC update.
segment.target: This section also describes the prerequisites that you must have for installing and deploying MED-V 2.0 throughout your enterprise, such as Windows Virtual PC and the required Windows Virtual PC update.

segment.source: Deploy the MED-V Components discusses the different ways you can install all of the necessary installation files and MED-V components throughout your enterprise.
segment.target: Deploy the MED-V Components discusses the different ways you can install all of the necessary installation files and MED-V components throughout your enterprise.

segment.source: To install and deploy MED-V, you typically follow these steps:
segment.target: To install and deploy MED-V, you typically follow these steps:

segment.source: Install the MED-V Workspace Packager on the administrator computer that you will use to build the MED-V workspace packages.
segment.target: Install the MED-V Workspace Packager on the administrator computer that you will use to build the MED-V workspace packages.

segment.source: For more information, see How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager.
segment.target: For more information, see How to Install the MED-V Workspace Packager.

segment.source: Create and test your MED-V workspace packages.
segment.target: Create and test your MED-V workspace packages.

segment.source: For more information, see Create a MED-V Workspace Package and Testing the MED-V Workspace Package.
segment.target: For more information, see Create a MED-V Workspace Package and Testing the MED-V Workspace Package.

segment.source: Deploy MED-V throughout your enterprise by using your company’s existing method for deploying applications.
segment.target: Deploy MED-V throughout your enterprise by using your company’s existing method for deploying applications.

segment.source: For more information, see Deploying the MED-V Workspace Package.
segment.target: For more information, see Deploying the MED-V Workspace Package.

segment.target: Related topics
